vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
διαγρηγορέω,
start into full wakefulness, [NT]; keep awake, πάσης τῆς νυκτὸς ἐν φροντίσιν καὶ δέει δ. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to become fully awake wake
to remain awake; to wake thoroughly, Lk. 9:32*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: despertarse por completo o permanecer despierto
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 保持清醒 (路 9:32)
3) 完全清醒 (經外用法)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 保持清醒 (路 9:32)
3) 完全清醒 (经外用法)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tỉnh thức; tỉnh táo; hoàn toàn tỉnh táo
